main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an object resembling a star moving in a straight line before fading into a cloud formation in Albany, Oregon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes., The object was described as 'pea size' and 'white like a star.', It faded into a cloud formation after moving away from another star., Two civilian Boeing 727 aircraft were traveling southward nearby at the time of the sighting., The report concluded that the object was likely a satellite.
